title: Pandemic Independence Day, F*** Daylight Savings? 3.15.21
itunes:title: Pandemic Independence Day, F*** Daylight Savings? 3.15.21
description:
In episode 831, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Yedoye Travis to discuss how everyone is suppose to be vaccinated starting May 1st, a McKinsey study about racism in Hollywood, daylight savings, Pi Day, Philadelphia's vaccine roll out, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. EVERYONE’S GETTING THE VAX!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  2. Black representation in film and TV: The challenges and impact of increasing diversity
  3. Spring forward forever? Lawmakers consider keeping daylight saving time year-round.
  4. Why it’s ridiculous that high schools start so early in the morning
  5. Last Call: What’s the most popular Pi Day pie in your state?
  6. In Philadelphia, A Scandal Erupts Over Vaccination Startup Led By 22-Year-Old
  7. ‘I’m A Freaking Grad Student’: Philly Fighting COVID CEO Andrei Doroshin Defends Work After City Cuts Ties With Group
  8. In Philadelphia, a mass vaccination clinic opened with fanfare, then closed amid rifts of trust
  9. Who, Exactly, Is Philly Fighting COVID?
  10. The Philly Fighting COVID disaster was also a huge data and privacy warning | Opinion
  11. FEMA’s mass vaccination site at Pennsylvania Convention Center prepares to open
  12. Experts worry that Philly Fighting COVID fuels mistrust in medicine, especially for Black and brown communities
  13. Vulnerable immigrants in Philly are scrambling to get the COVID-19 vaccine with few resources or outreach
  14. WATCH: LAKIM - whendoe - shoppa

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
